summary:
This is a very simple mod that allow Horses to be more stronger and cannot die easy and no death fall!
Also Increasing thier stamina & Power and also edit thier sadles!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Courier New][size=5][i]Vanilla Horses Overhaul
Better Horses v1.4E

[img]http://i66.tinypic.com/b5jint.jpg[/img][/i][/size][/font][/center]


[list]
[*]Game: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
[*]Author: SkulleR Aka Satafinix
[*]Version: 2.0Edition
[/list]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Description:[/size][/font]

This is a very simple mod i created for my brother because he hate the vanilla weak horses and he wont use any mod with scripts so here it is which allow Horses to be more stronger and cannot die easy and no more annonying death fall!
Also Increasing thier stamina & Power and also edit thier sadles!

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]Speed:
[/size][/font]
There is 3 Options:

[list=1]
[*]V.H.O +30 Speed Bonus: 130 Speed bonus!

[*]V.H.O +40 Speed Bonus: 140 Speed bonus!

[*]V.H.O +50 Speed Bonus: 150 Speed bonus!

[*]More than that will be overpowered!

[*]Also there is a sp√©cial option which have:

[*]V.H.O +30 Speed Bonus: 130 Speed bonus!

[*]Bigger & Muscled Horses!

[/list]

[font=Tahoma][size=3][b]This mod focused on:[/b][/size][/font]

[list]
[*]Cities Horses that player buy's from stables!
[*]Frost +5 speed bonus using any option & a new sadle and shadowmere eyes effects!
[*]ShadowMere + 10 speed bonus using any option!
[*]Essential Horses
[*]Friendly Releationship
[/list]

Credits:

SkulleR aka Satafinix
